title: A powerful app for parents, peace of mind for your school
subtitle: RutaKids connects families and schools in real time. These features enhance the parent experience and reduce school workload:
quote: “A school that informs and cares is a school families trust.”

features.title: Automatic notifications
features.description: Instant alerts when the student boards or gets off the bus.

features.title: Real-time location
features.description: Track the bus journey right from your phone.

features.title: Arrival confirmation
features.description: Receive automatic confirmation when the student arrives at school.

features.title: Full history
features.description: Access travel and school attendance records.
